caption.p: COVID-19 as a gerophilic and gerolavic infection. ( A) Distribution of patients diagnosed in the city of Wuhan only through February 11, 2020. ( B) Age distribution of the infected and diseased patients in Mainland China through February 11, 2020. The figures are adopted and generated from [ 12] ( http://weekly.chinacdc.cn/en/article/id/e53946e2-c6c4-41e9-9a9b-fea8db1a8f51).
